meanings.definition: To remove the outer layer of something
meanings.sent1: She was peeling the apple with a small knife.
meanings.sent2: The painter was peeling off the old wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried peeling the banana, but it ended up in a mess.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky seemed to be peeling away its colors.
meanings.sent5: The sound of peeling the orange filled the kitchen with freshness.

meanings.definition: A thin strip of material that has been removed from a surface
meanings.sent1: He found a peeling of paint on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The old door had many peelings hanging from it.
meanings.sent3: The peeling of the sticker made it hard to read the label.
meanings.sent4: The peeling of the bark revealed the tree's age.
meanings.sent5: The peeling of the wallpaper showed a glimpse of the past.
